Summary: at my back yard, when suddenly an unknown object appear high in the sky....
trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Charlotte on or around June 29th 2007
divs: sighting detailswell, i was in my back yard in the afternoon of that friday jun\29\2007 after one long day of work.i was with my old brother disscusing many things about our job, my brother was seated on his truck, and i was standed on the ground front of him, when suddenly he turned his eyes to the sky and pointed something upthere. in the first sight we thought that these object was a piece of paper, because it was white-brilliant and fly like moved by a wave.but surprise, it was moving high in the sky, and say this because in that moment was passing one airplane(my house is aproximately at 2.5 miles from douglas international airport, in charlotte)and the object was more high than the airplane, and was moving in a horizontal direction,from southwest to southeast. it take about 2 minutes to cross the portion of sky that can see from my backyard, passing over the airport, and we were watching it with a tasco that we keep in the truck.but that does not dissapered in the horizon line.suddenly, in a point of the sky, it simply dissapeared. maybe 30 seconds after, and while my brother and me were talking about the strange object,three militar crafts taken fligth from the national guard base of the airport, and take the direcction toward the object dissapeared seconds before.after 30 more seconds two more fightcrafts taken fligt from the airport, and they kept in the air of the neighborhood at least 5 minutes and then they went we don't know where. one more thing, the object had the shape like a mat, but from our position , we figure it alike dimensions of a big comercial plane, and the sky was clear and clouds free. that is all that we saw, and we don't have any video because didn't have a camcorder or camera. sorry, by the next time.
